title: Omega Squad Veigar.

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Omega Squad Veigar with ingame gameplay! Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Price: 1350RP Skin name is CONFIRMED as Omega Squad Veigar, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle.

body:
Firstly, awesome skin!
I cant wait for it.

I understand it's a pre-release video, so not all particle effects are absolutely final, and it could be that it is changed anyway. 

But change only comes about from the player base speaking up about what they do and don't like.
And id like to add my voice to the mix, just incase there are more people who also think this way and my voice can add to the counter. 

Can we get a different ult particle please?

for such a military-themed skin, a giant blue _(why is it blue?)_ magic ball doesn't seem to make much sense, and looks so bland. 
You can't really tell the difference between his R and Q apart from a slight size adjustment _(especially seeming they both travel pretty much the same speed)_

Ive seen suggestions about it being a nuke, which makes tons of sense. _(especially seeming his recall seems to reference North Korea's recent happenings.)_ and in game that type of ability is nicknamed a 'nuke' anyway.
But pretty much anything other than what it currently is would be an improvement imo. 

Even If the particle was the missile the comes out of his recall, it would be more fitting than the current particle, and then you wouldn't have to completely design another one. 

Just my opinion.

replies.body: Do like how his eyes go larger and swirly when stunned though
Hey, sorry to necro post on your thread but I'm curious: What does distiguished member mean? Are you also a volunteer? Because I am over in germany and also have a special board colour.

Distinguished members for us are essentially trusted members of the community, but not volunteers in the sense there's no real obligation for anything, it's just a fancy coloured name in recognition of your contributions to the community.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/GLk0EEmq-introducing-the-distinguished-members

i think that the indicators are way too clear (W and E) as a veigar player from season 5, his E use to have no delay, and the delay is already a huge nerf. I am just saying that the indicators can be a bit lighter than it is right now.
It is a very cool skin. The recall is cute. The ultimate could be made into a nuke as mentioned; but if that's the only issue, I can live with it.
i assume he will come out next patch probaly along with urgot but rn i want omega squad twitch and all his cromas
tbh, I love how his eyes light up with excitement when he uses his W
Gotta love how he just points his remote and presses the big red button with that gleam in his eyes xD

I also think that if his Q was shot from his gun rather then his hand, the gun would make actual sense to be there. Yes it it his auto attack, but it seems like such a big part of the skin to do so little.
